17.3" FHD 16:9 "Matte Type" Super Clear Ultra Bright LED Matte Screen (1920x1080)
4th Generation Intel® Haswell CoreTM i7-4700HQ (2.4GHz - 3.4GHz, 6MB Intel® Smart Cache)

2x 128GB Solid State Drive mSATA (256GB Total) + 1TB 5400RPM [SATA II - 3GB/s] / 32GB DDR3 1600MHz  (Dual Channel Memory (4x8GB SODIMMS)) Upgraded by Xotic PC / Intel® Dual Band Wireless-N 7260 802.11 A/B/G/N 2.4/5.0GHz + Bluetooth 4.0 | Up to 300Mbps (2x2)
WINDOWS 8.1 - 64-Bit (Pre-Installed) /  2 Year AORUS Warranty / ***Computers with parts upgraded by Xotic PC do require us to break the factory seal to perform the upgrades. Once parts have been installed, stressed tested, and the computer has gone through our Quality Assurance we will apply a new seal then ship the computer to you.
